comments.body:
I am not sure why we cannot use the same function in node_controller.go and when/where this func will be called?
If this func has to be added here, should the test also be added in node_lifecycle_controller_test.go?
+1, seems like this would be a good start for a controller utils package under cloud-provider.

A little duplication is acceptable here I think. I can't reuse ensureNodeExistsByProviderID from node_controller.go because it is in a separate package and ensureNodeExistsByProviderID is not widely used enough to justify a separate utils package for it either.
